features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: 7 powerful features for simple and efficient time management
features.ai_planning_desc: Describe your day in natural language, AI generates complete task list. Example: 'Developer, 9am-6pm, 1 hour lunch break' generates precise schedule.
features.progress_bar_desc: Transparent overlay at screen top or bottom, showing daily progress in real-time. Supports click-through, hover tips, multiple monitors.
features.pomodoro_desc: Built-in Pomodoro technique, customize focus and break times. Smart notifications, do-not-disturb mode for staying focused.
features.scenes_desc: Visual scene editor, drag-and-drop to design your progress bar backgrounds. Import/export scenes, perfect integration with progress bar.
features.analytics_desc: Track task completion rates, multi-dimensional analysis shows where your time goes. Visual reports, export function for data-driven management.
features.themes_desc: 6 beautiful preset themes, switch with one click. Fully customizable colors for each task, create your unique progress bar.
features.cloud_sync_desc: Multi-device automatic sync, access your settings on any computer. Secure backup, never lose data, stay consistent everywhere.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to your questions
faq.q1: üí° What's the difference between Free and Paid versions?
faq.a1: The Free version provides permanent access to core features (progress bar, Pomodoro timer, theme customization), with 3 daily AI planning credits and a branded watermark on the progress bar. The Paid version unlocks more AI credits (20-50/day), removes watermarks, and includes cloud sync, scene system, analytics, and other advanced features.
faq.a2: Currently we support WeChat Pay (recommended for domestic users). Stripe international payment is coming soon and will support Visa/Mastercard and other international credit cards.
faq.q3: üîÑ How to activate membership after purchase?
faq.a3: After successful payment, membership benefits will be automatically activated without manual activation code entry. Simply restart the app to enjoy member features, including watermark removal and increased AI credits.
faq.q4: üõ°Ô∏è Why does antivirus software flag it?
faq.a4: This is a false positive. GaiYa is packaged using PyInstaller, which some antivirus software marks as an "unknown application". Our software is completely open source, and you can view the complete source code on GitHub - it contains no malicious code. Solution: Add GaiYa to your antivirus software's whitelist.
faq.q5: üíª Does it support Mac or Linux?
faq.a5: Currently GaiYa only supports Windows 10/11 (64-bit) platforms. We are evaluating the feasibility of cross-platform versions, so stay tuned for future updates.
faq.a6: GaiYa Time Progress Bar is a virtual product, and refunds are not supported once purchased and activated. Please carefully read the feature descriptions before purchasing, and we recommend downloading the free version to try the core features before deciding whether to purchase membership.
